Shakti Venture Capital II.thesis: Backs bold founders reimagining global habits with new tech infrastructure. Invests as early as pre-revenue, initial checks up to $1M with follow-ons up to $1-2M for companies with product-market fit.

Davidovs Venture Capital.thesis: AI-focused seed and follow-on VC built on a community of 140+ founders (including 9 active unicorn founders). Backs repeat AI founders at pre-seed/seed ($100-300k) and follow-on at Series A/B ($1-3M).

CincyTech.thesis: Cincinnati-based venture capital firm investing in innovative founders tackling complex challenges. Portfolio spans biotech, healthtech, and enterprise software.

Tectonic Ventures III.thesis: Early-stage venture fund with 45+ investments across healthcare, fintech, and enterprise SaaS. Active deployer with 5 portfolio exits.

Tectonic Ventures Parallel III.thesis: Parallel vehicle for Tectonic Ventures III. Early-stage fund investing in healthcare, fintech, and enterprise SaaS.

Alter VC.thesis: Venture capital focused on emerging market tech entrepreneurs. Provides VC funding and talent in strategy and data science to scale startups globally.

WAVE Equity.thesis: Sustainability-focused private investment firm partnering with early-growth cleantech innovators. ~$440M AUM across three institutional funds. Focus on clean energy, water, recycling, food, hard-tech, and advanced materials.

Starkiller Capital.thesis: Digital asset investment management applying quantitative research. Team from DRW, Coinbase, Stripe, Tagomi. Focuses on Bitcoin ecosystem and crypto-native strategies.

SineWave Ventures Direct 2C.thesis: Early-stage venture capital bridging Silicon Valley and Capitol Hill. Invests in technology companies across commercial and public sector ecosystems.

Grant Park Ventures.thesis: Early-stage venture capital backing transformative founders in healthcare, fintech, logistics, and software. Strong network of healthcare providers, payers, and Fortune 500 executives.

General Innovation Capital Partners.thesis: Invests in leading advanced technology businesses at inflection points of growth that enhance the western way of life. Venture and growth investments in deep tech.

INTERSTATE FUSION VENTURES.thesis: First VC firm linking bi-coastal venture communities to Northeast Ohio. Invests in top-tier startups on the coasts and the Midwest, leveraging regional legacy corporations and research institutions.

Transform Health Ventures LLC.thesis: Pasadena-based venture capital firm investing in early-stage healthcare companies. Founded in 2023.

IASV Seed Ventures.thesis: Early-stage venture capital fund (IA Seed Ventures). Invests in seed-stage startups.

Geek Ventures NewHomesMate SPV, a series.thesis: Tech venture fund investing in immigrant founders building scalable products. Drives equal opportunity for visionary immigrant entrepreneurs through capital and connections.

Runway Healthcare.thesis: Chester County medtech accelerator and venture studio investing in early-stage medical device technologies. Provides venture capital and management services for healthcare product commercialization.

Shima GS Studio SPV LLC.thesis: Crypto-focused VC firm investing pre-seed and seed in web3 companies. ~$200M fund launched 2022. Based in Irvine, CA.

Climate Venture Capital.thesis: Venture capital fund focused on climate technology investments.

210k Capital._reason: Bitcoin/crypto trading fund (UTXO Management), not a VC

Focal Point Partners._reason: Fund of buyout funds / electrical services company, not VC

DRAKE CAPITAL PARTNERS II._reason: Hedge fund based in Greenwich, not a VC
